options.title: -d delim
options.description: Use DELIM to terminate lines, instead of newline

options.title: -n count
options.description: Copy at most COUNT lines. If COUNT is 0, all lines are copied

options.title: -O origin
options.description: Begin assigning to ARRAY at index ORIGIN. The default index is 0

options.title: -s count
options.description: Discard the first COUNT lines read

options.title: -t
options.description: Remove a trailing DELIM from each line read (default newline)

options.title: -u fd Read lines from file descriptor FD instead of the standard input
-C callback
options.description: Evaluate CALLBACK each time QUANTUM lines are read

options.title: -c quantum
options.description: Specify the number of lines read between each call to CALLBACK
